page.description: Updates the argument values in the child UX component and refreshes the data shown in List controls and other controls that are based on data Series. Also causes the embedded UX component's 'onSynchronizeDialog' (client-side) and 'onSynchronize' (server-side) events to fire.

item.name: Embedded UX Component
item.description: Specify the name of the embedded UX component. (Note: Only components that have explicit aliases - not the default <DefaultAlias> - are shown.)
